messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I am one of the Ninja Trio!
Being discovered means I must battle!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
My cover is blown, so what should
I do?Maybe I’ll go catch some Contests in
Hearthome City. Maybe I’ll do that.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Do you remember me?
I am one of the Ninja Trio! Being discovered means I must battle!
